synopsis.text:
Japan's first manned space mission ends in catastrophe, leaving a trail of devastation in the small town of Yuigahama. Kamogawa Asumi, a young girl, finds herself mourning the loss of her mother in the tragic accident. In the midst of her grief, Asumi encounters an enigmatic spirit donning a lion's mask, who shares captivating tales of the cosmos. Inspired by these stories and bolstered by her father's unwavering support, Asumi becomes resolute in her pursuit of becoming an astronaut.

Years later, Asumi, now a tenacious young woman, is joined by many equally gifted peers as they strive to pass the rigorous entrance exam for a renowned space academy. With her father and the spectral Lion-san by her side, Asumi embarks on a journey marked by both joy and sorrow, fueled by her unwavering determination to reach for the stars and honor the memory of her mother.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
